page.title: 06EDUCATION IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: In the education system in our area there are six{primary schools,(5-11) one{secondary}school (11-16+) two{nursery}schools (2-5) and{Rossendale College}(16+). { Bacup and Rawtenstall Grammar School is the main school in our area. The primarys' are Newchurch C.E, Cloughfold,Waterfoot,Newchurch R.C,St Mary's C.E,and Balladen. There are two nursery schools which are Stag Hills and Newchurch. The{Rossendale College is under repair. This is what work would be done in a primary school in a day:-Assembly 09:00,maths 09:30,play time 10:35, maths 11:00,english 11:30,dinner time 12:05 ,reading 13:00,play time 14:00, topic work 14:30,home time 15:05.
